Description: Body sherd of Chian pottery transport amphora. Coarse, reddish brown (2.5 YR 4/4) clay with much silver mica and white inclusions. White slip; exterior: two bands fired red-brown.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p. 23, no. A14, pl. 4, 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.002)
